title: In the Box
overview: In his ProSieben show "Schulz in the Box", Olli Schulz asks himself what would have been if he had given his life a different direction.Curious about everything unknown, he lets himself be "kidnapped" from his familiar surroundings: crammed into a wooden box, Olli is shipped to a wide variety of places with very special people and special tasks.The entertainer has to find his way around his new situation without preparation: locked behind bars, immersed in the bizarre hit world, exposed in Tokyo or under the wing of a Russian oligarch - Olli Schulz has to endure a completely foreign life for 24 hours...At the end of the first season, Olli Schulz quit the show and for the second season, various celebrities were instead placed in the box.
